Source

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Source.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board is the class that represents a Board.

    A Board is characterized by the following informations :

    • A list of players
    • A Cells tab
    • A Player iterator, to let the board knows what player is currently playing.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leo JUMEL et Brice NUZZO

        public int normalize(int idx)
